activities:
This Certification applies to RelateIQ’s Web-based applications and platform services provided via https://www.relateiq.com/ or associated Web pages, which allow customers and their users to access, use, manage and share electronic data and information, including personal data, submitted by customers and their users to servers used by RelateIQ.  In this context, RelateIQ acts as a data processor and does not determine how its customers’ data is utilized in servers used by RelateIQ. RelateIQ does not choose or determine the content of the data submitted to servers used by RelateIQ, and any access to, or use of, such data is incidental to completing the contractual obligations of RelateIQ, as data processor, to its customers.  

As part of RelateIQ’s internal operations, RelateIQ transfers personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective business partners to its U.S. data centers for processing and storage. RelateIQ collects, transfers, and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, and business partner recruitment purposes. In this context, RelateIQ acts as a data controller. 

For clarification, this Certification does not apply to RelateIQ’s Web-based applications and platform services to the extent RelateIQ provides users with access to personal data that RelateIQ obtains from publicly available sources on the Internet and/or from third party data partners. Individuals to whom such data relates may be able to opt out of being included in such processing by visiting the linked privacy policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, client, customer, prospect and business partner data
